title.style: font-family: verdana; color: #ffaa00; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-style: oblique; background-color: #ffffff;

subtitle.style: font-family: monospace; color: #00ff00; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; background-color: #ffffff;

legend.style: font-family: verdana; font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 10; border-top-color: #880a0f; font-style: italic;

labels.style: font-family: monospace; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; font-style: oblique;
